title: Fix blank home screen by implementing IndexPage content

requirements.summary: Replace the empty IndexPage placeholder content with a functional home screen that displays a welcome message and indicates the app is ready for use
acceptanceCriteria: The IndexPage component renders visible content instead of a blank screen
Users see a clear welcome message or starter content when visiting the root route
The page layout is properly structured within the existing Layout component

file_operations.description: Replace the minimal placeholder content with a functional home screen featuring a centered welcome message, brief description, and visual structure that makes it clear the application is ready for use. Include a headline welcoming users, explanatory text indicating the starter template is ready for customization, and proper spacing using Tailwind utilities to create a polished landing experience.

requirements.summary: Update the application title in frontend/index.html from 'New Application' to a meaningful placeholder or generic app name
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays a proper application title instead of 'New Application'
The title is generic enough to work for any new application being built

file_operations.description: Change the title element from 'New Application' to a more meaningful generic placeholder such as 'Starter Application' or 'App Template' that better represents a ready-to-customize application template.

requirements.summary: Verify that the App.tsx router configuration correctly mounts IndexPage at the root route and that Layout wrapper is properly applied
acceptanceCriteria: The root route ('/') successfully renders the IndexPage component
The Layout component header and footer are visible on the home screen
No console errors appear related to routing or component mounting

file_operations.description: Review and verify the router configuration to ensure IndexPage is correctly mounted at the root route '/' within the Layout wrapper. Confirm that the route structure properly renders the Layout component with header and footer around the IndexPage content. If any issues are found in the routing setup, correct them to ensure proper component mounting without console errors.
